thread.title: Why It's Important Not to Say No Right Away
thread.title_full: Why It's Important Not to Say No Right Away

title: Why It's Important Not to Say No Right Away
text:
Networking Why It's Important Not to Say No Right Away Steve Miller, Partner and co-founder of Origin, says building relationships within your professional network will allow you to grow. Reader Resource 
Join Entrepreneur's The Goal Standard Challenge and make 2017 yours. Learn more Â» 
Origin provides the intellectual and financial capital to help companies navigate the transition from the formative stage to the business model stage. Partner and Co-Founder Steve Miller knows the importance of being a good judge of people and the investment in a business. Miller says building relationships within your professional network will allow you to grow. What is something that Steve Miller and Steven Colbert have in common? Click play to find out. 
Related: Adapting is the Key to a Successful Business 
Entrepreneur Network is a premium video network providing entertainment, education and inspiration from successful entrepreneurs and thought leaders. We provide expertise and opportunities to accelerate brand growth and effectively monetize video and audio content distributed across all digital platforms for the business genre. 
EN is partnered with hundreds of top YouTube channels in the business vertical and provides partners with distribution on Entrepreneur.com as well as our apps on Amazon Fire , Roku and Apple TV . 
Click here to become a part of this growing video network.
